# Government Tender Announcement
## Building Condition Assessment – Royalmount/Decelles
### Tender Reference Number: PW-22-01018136

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Procurement Category:** Professional Services
**Solicitation Number:** 22-58113
**Publication Date:** December 21, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** February 2, 2023, 14:00 EST

**Project Overview:**
The National Research Council Canada (NRC) is seeking a contractor to conduct building condition assessments for three of its real property assets located in Montreal, Quebec. The purpose of this project is to evaluate the current condition of the buildings and provide a comprehensive report on their physical state, recommended maintenance and corrective actions, and life-cycle capital costs.

**Project Objectives:**

* Assess the condition of building elements, including structure, building envelope, electrical, and mechanical systems
* Provide a detailed report on the history of additions, renovations, and major system improvements
* Offer recommendations on maintenance requirements, essential corrective/remedial actions, and life-cycle capital costs
* Provide a detailed report on the current replacement value or replacement cost new of each building and its major group elements, group elements, individual elements, and sub-elements

**Scope of Work:**
The contractor will be responsible for conducting a comprehensive building condition assessment for three buildings, including:

* 6100 avenue Royalmount, Montréal, QC H4P 2R2
* Building MTLD-1, 5145 Decelles Avenue, Montréal, QC H3S 2S4

**Deliverables:**

* A comprehensive report on the building condition assessment, including a detailed description of the building elements, their condition, and recommended maintenance and corrective actions
* A detailed report on the life-cycle capital costs, including replacement costs and maintenance requirements
* A 25-year capital plan indicating the optimal timing and grouping of recommended "events" into projects

**Contract Information:**

* Estimated quantity of commodity: 3 buildings for assessment
* Duration of contract: December 20, 2023, to June 30, 2023
* Time frame of delivery: December 20, 2023, to June 30, 2023
